results.question: In "Star Trek", what sauce is commonly used by Klingons on bregit lung?

What was the name of the inflatable duck sacrified to the crowd at the end of Episode 34 of the 18th season of Big Brother?

Which of these Nickelodeon game shows aired first?
In 2008, British celebrity chef Gordon Ramsay believes he almost died after suffering what accident in Iceland while filming?
results.correct_answer: Slipping off a cliff, and nearly drowning in icy water
incorrect_answers: Crash landing when arriving at Keflavík airport
A minor car accident in a snowstorm
Being served under-cooked chicken at his hotel

results.question: In "Donkey Kong Country", why does Donkey Kong want to know the secret of the crystal coconut?
incorrect_answers: To find out where all the bananas are.

results.question: In "Star Trek", who was the founder of the Klingon Empire and its philosophy?
incorrect_answers: Lady Lukara of the Great Hall
